sense.gloss: man who is financially dependent on a woman, gigolo, pimp
important connection, important social foundation, close relation, tight relationship, intimate relation, close link
having strings attached (of a loan, etc.), having conditions attached, having restrictions attached
having a string or cord attached (of a bag, clothing, etc.), something with a string attached
having a lover (of a woman), woman with a male lover
cord tied around the waist of a kimono before an obi is tied
to read (a book), to open (a book) to read
to unravel (e.g. a mystery), to discover (the truth)
string tied across the open chest of a haori
small strap tied at the waist of a hanpi
ribbon worm (any worm of phylum Nemertea)

r_ele.r: さいふのひもをにぎる

sense.gloss: small ancient mirror tied with a cord
string tied to the chest of one's kimono or haori
childhood (period where one would wear such a string)
to do up one's shoelaces, to tie one's shoes, to lace up one's shoes
baby backpack, back-mounted baby carrier, sling
x: 負ぶい紐・おぶいひも

sense.gloss: baby backpack, back-mounted baby carrier, sling
x: おんぶ紐・おんぶひも

sense.gloss: to link (information, accounts, etc.), to associate, to connect
strap-toothed whale (Mesoplodon layardii), Layard's beaked whale
love-lies-bleeding (Amaranthus caudatus), tassel flower, velvet flower, foxtail amaranth, Inca wheat

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓びなさい。
sdata.e: Tie your shoelaces.

sdata.j: ↑我↑↓わ↓が↑家↑↓や↓では↑女房↑↓にょうぼう↓が↑財布↑↓さいふ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑握↑↓にぎ↓っている。
sdata.e: My wife holds the purse strings in our family.

sdata.j: ほら、↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓がほどけているよ。
sdata.e: Look, your shoelaces have come undone.

sdata.j: そのボートは↑短↑↓みじか↓い↑紐↑↓ひも↓でつながれていた。
sdata.e: The boat was tied with a short line.

sdata.j: スーツケースに↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑縛↑↓しば↓りつけなさい。
sdata.e: Tighten the strap around the suitcase.

sdata.j: この↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑切↑↓き↓るためのナイフを↑貸↑↓か↓してください。
sdata.e: Give me a knife to cut this string with.

sdata.j: エプロンの↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓んでください。
sdata.e: Tie the apron.

sdata.j: ↑財布↑↓さいふ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑締↑↓し↓めなくてはいけない。
sdata.e: We have to be careful with expenses.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓をほどいた。
sdata.e: I loosened my shoelaces.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑箱↑↓はこ↓がばらばらにならないように↑紐↑↓ひも↓でしっかり↑結↑↓むす↓んだ。
sdata.e: I fastened the box tight with a rope so that it wouldn't break up.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑親切↑↓しんせつ↓にも↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓んでくれた。
sdata.e: He was kind enough to tie my shoelaces.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はその↑小包↑↓こづつみ↓にしっかりと↑紐↑↓ひも↓をかけた。
sdata.e: She tied up the parcel with string.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓↑物↑↓ぶつ↓を↑紐↑↓ひも↓にかけた。
sdata.e: She hung the washing on the line.

sdata.j: ↑母↑↓はは↓は↑１↑↓いっ↓↑本↑↓ぽん↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓で↑３↑↓さん↓↑本↑↓ぼん↓の↑鉛筆↑↓えんぴつ↓を↑結↑↓ゆ↓わえた。
sdata.e: Mother tied up three pencils with a piece of string.

sdata.j: 「これは↑何↑↓なに↓？↑供物↑↓くもつ↓か？」「そうだよ、このお↑賽銭↑↓さいせん↓↑箱↑↓ばこ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑入↑↓い↓れて・・・この↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓るの」
sdata.e: What is this? An offering? "That's right. Put it in this offertory box ... and pull this rope."

sdata.j: も～う、モタモタしないの。↑遅刻↑↓ちこく↓になっちゃうでしょ。ほら、↑紐↑↓ひも↓、↑結↑↓むす↓んであげる。
sdata.e: Oooh, get a move on. We'll end up late! Come on, I'll tie your shoelaces for you.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓↑紐↑↓ひも↓が↑解↑↓と↓けていますよ。
sdata.e: Your shoes are untied.

sdata.j: ジョギングしに↑行↑↓い↓く↑前↑↓まえ↓にいつも↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑硬↑↓かた↓く↑締↑↓し↓めます。
sdata.e: I always tie my shoes tightly before I go jogging.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑衣服↑↓いふく↓を↑紐↑↓ひも↓で↑束↑↓たば↓ねた。
sdata.e: He bound the clothes together with a string.

sdata.j: トムは↑紐↑↓ひも↓の↑梯子↑↓はしご↓を↑上↑↓のぼ↓った。
sdata.e: Tom climbed up the rope ladder.

sdata.j: トムはまだ↑靴↑↓くつ↓↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓べない。
sdata.e: Tom can't yet tie his own shoes.

sdata.j: トムはまだ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓が↑結↑↓むす↓べない。
sdata.e: Tom can't yet tie his own shoes.

sdata.j: トムはまだ↑靴↑↓くつ↓↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓べない。
sdata.e: Tom can't tie his own shoes yet.

sdata.j: トムはまだ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓が↑結↑↓むす↓べない。
sdata.e: Tom can't tie his own shoes yet.

sdata.j: トムは↑靴↑↓くつ↓↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓ぶためにかがんだ。
sdata.e: Tom bent over to tie his shoe.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑靴↑↓くつ↓↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓ぶためにしゃがんだ。
sdata.e: He bent down to tie his shoe.

sdata.j: トムは↑靴↑↓くつ↓↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓ぶためにしゃがんだ。
sdata.e: Tom bent down to tie his shoe.

sdata.j: ↑今月↑↓こんげつ↓は↑財布↑↓さいふ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑締↑↓し↓めなくちゃ。
sdata.e: I have to reduce my expenses this month.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑靴↑↓くつ↓の↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑結↑↓むす↓ぶのを↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってくれた。
sdata.e: He helped me tie my shoes.

sdata.j: 「イヤホン↑片方↑↓かたほう↓なくしちゃったみたい。ショックだな」「↑紐↑↓ひも↓↑付↑↓つ↓けとけばよかったのに」「それじゃぁ、ワイヤレスの↑意味↑↓いみ↓がないでしょ？」
sdata.e: I'm in shock because I think that I have lost one of my earphones. "You should have probably linked them together beforehand." "But then what's the point of them being wireless?"
